entity.name: FOX News Sunday With Chris Wallace
entity.description: Journalist Chris Wallace moderates the Fox News political issues program, featuring interview with newsmakers of the day, focusing on the current topics and issues facing the country. The son of CBS newsman Mike Wallace, Chris Wallace also previously helmed the NBC weekend political show "Meet the Press."

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
Jerome Adams informs Chris Wallace that more people will die from smoking than coronavirus. 

Remember that time cigarette smoke shut down the economy, trapped people at home & flooded emergency rooms beyond capacity?

The Trump WH is filled with incompetent clowns. #HowWeGotHere
